data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dubatolov, Vladimir V., Kishida, Yasunori, Wu, Chunsheng (2014): Review of East Asian Heliosia (Ledidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae: Lithosiini) species, with description of a new genus. Zootaxa 3802 (3): 373-380, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3802.3.6
